name: df-fr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wfr(c0, c1), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), emptycls)), wrex(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wn(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define the well-founded relation predicate. Definition 6.24(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30. For alternate definitions, see ~ dffr2 and ~ dffr3 . (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-1994.)
